name: Kinevox
tagline: what will one day be a great game engine
body:
Welcome to Kinevox. We recommend using the kinebox_bootstrap to set yourself up.
you will need:
python
scons - http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/scons/scons-2.2.0-setup.exe
OpenAL - http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/Downloads/OpenAL11CoreSDK.zip
and a few more if you are on linux/osx

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```




### Authors and Contributors
Francois Coulombe - fcoulombe@github
Jeffrey Lim
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
